mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , MAIN_CATE_CODE , MEMBER_ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE , ITEM_COMMENT , VIEW_CNT , ITEM_STATUS , TRADE_TYPE , TRADE_ADDR , ATTACHED_NAME , IMG_CODE , IS_MAIN , SALES_STATUS FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE ORDER BY IS_MAIN DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ATTACHED_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(WISH_CODE) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE ITEM_CODE = S.ITEM_CODE) AS CNT_WISH_LIST , SALES_STATUS FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I, WISH_LIST W WHERE S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND S.ITEM_CODE = W.ITEM_CODE(+) AND S.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ATTACHED_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(WISH_CODE) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE ITEM_CODE = S.ITEM_CODE) AS CNT_WISH_LIST , SALES_STATUS FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I, WISH_LIST W WHERE S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND S.ITEM_CODE = W.ITEM_CODE(+) AND S.MEMBER_ID = (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM SHOP_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}) AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 4 ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUM ,ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,MEMBER_ID ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM ,ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,MEMBER_ID ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM ( SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,MEMBER_ID ,ITEM_PRICE ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM ITEM,ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' AND ITEM.ITEM_CODE=IMG.ITEM_CODE AND SALES_STATUS='ON_SALE' ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC )) WHERE ROW_NUM >= #{startNum} AND ROW_NUM <= #{endNum} AND IS_MAIN='Y'

SELECT ROW_NUM ,ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,MEMBER_ID ,MAIN_CATE_CODE ,SUB_CATE_CODE ,DETAIL_CATE_CODE ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM ,ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,MEMBER_ID ,MAIN_CATE_CODE ,SUB_CATE_CODE ,DETAIL_CATE_CODE ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM ( SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,MEMBER_ID ,MAIN_CATE_CODE ,SUB_CATE_CODE ,DETAIL_CATE_CODE ,ATTACHED_NAME ,IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM ITEM,ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE (SELECT MAIN_CATE_NAME FROM MAIN_CATE WHERE MAIN_CATE_CODE=ITEM.MAIN_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR (SELECT SUB_CATE_NAME FROM SUB_CATE WHERE SUB_CATE_CODE=ITEM.SUB_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR (SELECT DETAIL_CATE_NAME FROM DETAIL_CATE WHERE DETAIL_CATE_CODE=ITEM.DETAIL_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' AND ITEM.ITEM_CODE=IMG.ITEM_CODE AND SALES_STATUS='ON_SALE' ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC )) WHERE ROW_NUM >= #{startNum} AND ROW_NUM <= #{endNum} AND IS_MAIN='Y'
SELECT COUNT(ITEM_CODE) FROM SHOP_ITEM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT COUNT(ITEM_CODE) FROM SHOP_ITEM ITEM WHERE (SELECT MAIN_CATE_NAME FROM MAIN_CATE WHERE MAIN_CATE_CODE=ITEM.MAIN_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR (SELECT SUB_CATE_NAME FROM SUB_CATE WHERE SUB_CATE_CODE=ITEM.SUB_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR (SELECT DETAIL_CATE_NAME FROM DETAIL_CATE WHERE DETAIL_CATE_CODE=ITEM.DETAIL_CATE_CODE) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP_ITEM SET VIEW_CNT=VIEW_CNT+1 WHERE ITEM_CODE=#{itemCode}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(VIEW_CNT),0) FROM SHOP_ITEM WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
